title: Salesforce CEO's big confession on AI after replacing 4,000 employees with Artificial Intelligence agents
description: Salesforce is cutting customer support jobs, replacing them with AI. However, CEO Marc Benioff believes AI cannot replace human salespeople. He highlights the importance of face-to-face interaction and is now hiring thousands of new sales staff. This move contrasts with industry trends where tech giants are reducing staff while investing in AI. Benioff calls this shift 'reality'.

content:

title: Central Asia’s biggest state continues to push political reforms
description: Kazakhstan is embarking on major political and socioeconomic reforms. President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev highlighted the importance of upcoming parliamentary reform. The country is moving towards a unicameral Parliament. This reform aims to enhance efficiency and citizen participation. Digitalization and artificial intelligence will play a key role.

title: Sex Is a Big Market for the AI Industry: ChatGPT Won't Be the First to Try to Profit From It
description: ChatGPT will be able to have kinkier conversations after OpenAI CEO Sam Altman announced the artificial intelligence company will soon allow its chatbot to engage in “erotica for verified adults."OpenAI won't be the first to try to profit from sexualized AI. description: Artificial intelligence trial frees up medics for front-line duties
content:
